About this property
Comfortable Accommodations: Makarun Heritage Rooms in Split offers family rooms with air-conditioning, private bathrooms, and modern amenities. Each room includes a work desk, mini-bar, and free WiFi throughout the property.

Dining Experience: Guests can enjoy a romantic restaurant serving Mediterranean, seafood, local, international, and Croatian cuisines. Breakfast options include continental, à la carte, Italian, vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free. Additional services include room service and a coffee shop.

Prime Location: Located 14 mi from Split Airport, the property is a short walk from Diocletian's Palace (656 feet) and Bacvice Beach (13-minute walk). Nearby attractions include Split City Museum and Cathedral of St. Domnius.

Guest Services: The property offers private check-in and check-out, concierge service, and paid shuttle. Guests can participate in culture classes, enjoy the terrace, and engage in activities such as walking tours and hiking.
